SEARCH
Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers

Class ContractController

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.ContractController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/contracts") public class ContractController extends Object
Controller class for managing contracts in the building management system.

  • Constructor Details

    • ContractController

      @Autowired public ContractController(ContractService contractService, PdfFileGenerator pdfFileGenerator, TxtFileGenerator txtFileGenerator, CsvFileGenerator csvFileGenerator, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Constructs a new ContractController with the specified services and session.
      Parameters:
      contractService - The contract service to use.
      pdfFileGenerator - The PDF file generator.
      txtFileGenerator - The TXT file generator.
      csvFileGenerator - The CSV file generator.
      session - The HTTP session.

  • Method Details

    • downloadContractFile

      @PostMapping("/downloadFile") public void downloadContractFile(@RequestParam("contractId") String contractId, @RequestParam("fileType") String fileType, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles the download of contract files based on the given contract ID and file type.
      Parameters:
      contractId - The ID of the contract.
      fileType - The type of file to download (pdf, txt, csv).
      response - The HTTP response.

    • getAllContracts

      @GetMapping("/contractsList") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAllContracts()
      Retrieves all contracts and returns a ModelAndView containing the contracts list view.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying all contracts.

    • getAllContractsCustomer

      @GetMapping("/contractsListCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAllContractsCustomer()
      Retrieves all contracts for a customer and returns a ModelAndView containing the customer's contracts list view.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying all contracts for a customer.

    • getContractById

      @GetMapping("/searchContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getContractById(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)
      Retrieves a contract by its ID and returns a ModelAndView containing details of the contract.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying the contract details.

    • getContractByIdCustomer

      @GetMapping("/searchContractCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getContractByIdCustomer(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)
      Retrieves a contract by its ID for a customer and returns a ModelAndView containing details of the contract.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying the contract details for a customer.

    • showInsertContractPage

      @GetMapping("/insertContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showInsertContractPage()
      Displays the page for inserting a new contract.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying the insert contract page.

    • createContract

      @PostMapping("/insertContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createContract(@ModelAttribute ContractDTO contractDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Handles the creation of a new contract.
      Parameters:
      contractDTO - The contract DTO containing contract information.
      bindingResult - The result of binding contract DTO.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView indicating the result of the contract creation attempt.

    • getContractForUpdate

      @GetMapping("/updateContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getContractForUpdate(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)
      Retrieves a contract by its ID for update and returns a ModelAndView containing details of the contract.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to update.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView for displaying the contract update form.

    • updateContract

      @PostMapping("/updateContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateContract(@RequestParam(required=false) String id, @ModelAttribute ContractDTO contractDTO)
      Handles the update of an existing contract.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to update.
      contractDTO - The updated contract DTO.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView indicating the result of the contract update attempt.

    • deleteContract

      @PostMapping("/deleteContract") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteContract(@RequestParam UUID id)
      Handles the deletion of a contract.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to delete.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView indicating the result of the contract deletion attempt.
